item.title: Turkish lira, stock market drop after Istanbul mayor and Erdogan rival arrested
item.description: Imamoglu, the popular 53-year-old mayor was seen as the next opposition party candidate for the Turkish presidency.

item.title: Trump and Putin agree on 'energy and infrastructure ceasefire' as step to Ukraine peace deal
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy last week said that Kyiv would agree to a broader 30-day ceasefire if Russia also signed.
